Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory393.jpg'}
{3: 'The morning breeze has swayed the flowers and scattered their petals.'}
{3: 'In contrast to the tranquility surrounding them, those standing in the center of the flower field are in a tense confrontation.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: "Critical success! The gravity suction spell worked. Let me see who's the unlucky one.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Dungeon Master Ayla', 3: "Gray Raven's Lucia, Liv, Lee, and 【kuroname】in ghost form. Rolling the results for you now."}
{2: 'Dungeon Master Ayla', 3: "3 escaped, 1 affected by the spell. Demon Ayla's gravity suction spell worked on... Liv."}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "Hehe, Liv's mine.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Ayla hugs Liv and pulls her close.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: "Don't forget your lines, Liv.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Am I really going to say that...? "Help, help."', 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Wait, we have our gravity suction spell too. Commandant!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Dungeon Master Ayla', 3: "Due to your ghost form, the spell's success chance is extremely low. The result of the throw is... Critical failure."}
{3: 'On the screen, the transparent, irregular object that represents your soul is pulled toward Ayla like a stretched dough.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: "Hooray! Commandant's mine too!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "Commandant, Liv, just hold on a little longer. I'm coming.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Dungeon Master Ayla', 3: 'Lucia swings her blade. Unfortunately, she fails to break free from the vines.'}
{2: 'Dungeon Master Ayla', 3: 'Under the effect of poison, Lucia of Gray Raven has insufficient strength. The action to swing a blade has failed.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Shouldn't have spent so many points on intelligence...", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Haha. Has everyone finished their turn?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Good. Time for Demon Ayla to move!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Ayla takes her hand off Liv and wields her giant scythe.'}
{3: 'The swish of the scythe can be heard clearly. You can almost see yourself cut into pieces by the dancing blade.'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Tonight, Demon Ayla joins the hunt.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: "The next instant, a bullet hits the demon's face."}
{3: 'It leaves a big hole in her head. She collapses with a smile frozen on her face.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory14.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Wait, wait! That was so mean!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Inside the lounge, Ayla closes her script, then tries really hard to find a rule that can stop Lee from "shooting the demon" in the handbook.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: '"Omega weapon" allows me to use any weapon in my knowledge as long as it\'s operated with my hands.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Besides, the "ensnaring vines" only worked on my lower body. With my upper body free, I can fire with no problem.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'I know, I know... Um... It all seems to make sense.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Admitting her defeat, Ayla opens the script again to conclude the story.'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Well, our team of heroes finally came to confront the demon. After a short engagement, Demon Ayla used her spell to capture Liv.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Soon, 【kuroname】 was also impacted by their own spell. Things seemed to have gone bad really quickly. Lucia dragged her weak body to move forward...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Just then, Lee took out a steel tube that utilized the propulsion of gunpowder, killing the demon on the spot with a 140 gr metal piece...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Post-Reconquista Age surreal absurdism...?', 3: '91'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'I can already think of what the audience would say.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Ayla claps her hands to her head. Everyone seems to have seen the disaster this screenplay would bring...'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'You asked us to be as imaginative as we could...', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory14.png'}
{3: '4 hours ago, when Gray Raven was preparing for the Dragon Boat Festival...'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "Liv, I've got the ingredients for rice dumplings.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Thanks, Lucia. Leave it to me. Lee, can you take over here?', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'No problem. I have set the timer. 2 min 37 sec.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Everybody is busy preparing for the upcoming Dragon Boat Festival in the kitchen.'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Guess we have to stop here...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Someone has pushed the door open—the kitchen used old-school doors for a more festive feel.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Would you like to make a movie together, dear Gray Raven?', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory14.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: '"We\'ll create a script via a role-playing game, then make it into a movie and show it on the Dragon Boat Festival." That\'s what you said.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Indeed. But a story needs to be dramatic.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'I did some searching in the game forum. It seems that as long as we follow our heart to play this game, it can be sufficiently... dramatic.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "Anyway, I have a good understanding of your play style now. Here's a new script.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Bring it on. Reset the adventure world!', 4: '2'}
{3: "Lee follows Ayla's instructions to enter the commands. The scrolling ending screen quickly disappears."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiHuaping.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'A new world based on AI-generated images is unveiled.'}
